How It Works

Earning rewards is simple! Follow these three easy steps to start making money with referrals.

1

Share Your Code

Share your unique referral code with friends through social media, messaging, or in person.

2

Friend Joins Cufy

Your friend signs up using your referral code and completes their profile verification.

3

Both Get Rewards

You both receive rewards once your friend subscribes to any Cufy premium plan!

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I get my referral rewards?

Rewards are automatically credited to your Cufy wallet within 24 hours of your friend subscribing to a premium plan. You can withdraw them or use them for your own subscription.

Is there a limit to how many friends I can refer?

No! There's no limit to referrals. The more friends you refer, the more you earn and the higher your tier level becomes.

What if my friend doesn't subscribe immediately?

No worries! The referral remains valid for 30 days. As long as they subscribe within this period using your code, you'll both get the rewards.

Can I refer someone who already has a Cufy account?

Referrals only work for new users who haven't created a Cufy account before. Existing users cannot use referral codes.

Start Earning Today!
